title: What is the meaning of a musical bed in music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Musical bed is a term used in the music industry known as instrumental composition or backing track. Beat Makers that make beats such as myself are a type of Songwriter or Composer that writes and programs beats. They are reffered to as the “Track Writer” when it comes to publishing royalties. The Lyricist that writes the lyrics and vocal melody on top of a pre-made beat are reffered to as the “Top-Liner”. I will use Scott Storch as an sinces hes both a Record Producer and a Songwriter. The example below is an estimated example given that songwriting share is negotiable between the writers. Number’s may look different as Fat Joe could of gotten a much larger percentage than Remy Ma or verse vica. A musical bed is a songwriting-composition term used in music production. A musical bed consists of the bottom layers of tracks consisting of bass, drums, the main harmonic progression with chordal instruments like guitars or keyboards, and other musical effects—usually created by a music producer. The musical bed is then given to an artist to compose the melody and lyrics on top. The musical bed is like the foundation of a song and its creator receives writing credit and royalties—the finished song cannot be licensed without permission from all who created the song. www.musictheoryshop.com
